entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. My name is Alex. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. It's a VeloBand Pulse I bought recently. I'm not happy with it.
I understand. I can certainly help you with a return. Can you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
It's under [Customer Email Address]. And hurry up, I don't have all day.
Thank you. I've located your order. I see the VeloBand Pulse here. Can you tell me why you'd like to return it?
It's just not working out. The heart rate monitoring is terrible, and frankly, I expected more from a smart watch that costs this much. How do I get my money back?
I apologize that the VeloBand Pulse didn't meet your expectations. No problem at all, we can process a return for you. Let me check our return policy...

Okay, it looks like you are well within our return policy. We offer a full refund within 90 days of purchase. Since you recently purchased the VeloBand Pulse, this will not be a problem. You are eligible.
Ninety days? Really? Because the website made it sound like I had a very limited window. I think it's been, like, fifteen days since I got it.

Yes, that is correct. Our standard return policy is 90 days. I can generate a return shipping label for you right now. You'll receive a full refund once we receive the VeloBand Pulse back at our warehouse.
Okay, great! Finally, some progress. Just get me that label. Do I need some kind of authorization or something?

No, no authorization needed. I'm emailing you the prepaid return shipping label now. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse securely in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. You’ll see the refund processed back to your original payment method within 7-10 business days after we receive it.
Perfect. Thank you. That's all I needed. Appreciate you getting this sorted out so quickly. I was worried it'd be a hassle, but I'm happy you followed the return policy.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
